all_things_in_murderation

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • all_things_in_murderation.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mob

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Main player class Has a name list of item the player has the current room the player is in and if player changed the name at the beginning of the game
    Author:
    Nodar Sotkilava, Hal Stewart, Emily Pochet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Player(Room r, java.lang.String name)
      Simple constructor; usually a placeholder name and then player changes the name in UI
